name: Juke
description:
Maneuver through tough levels and oppose difficult bosses on a mission born of desperation and determination. Juke is a challenging game that aims to create a harrowing but rewarding experience through overcoming intense roadblocks.

Key features:
  • Tight controls
  • 9 worlds + 1 hidden / unlock-able world
  • 132 levels + 18 bosses
  • New challenges in each world
